translations: 有偏见的，偏袒一方的；偏向……的，偏重……的
使有偏心，使偏向；加偏压于（bias 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He seemed a bit biased against women in my opinion.
sentences.translation: 我认为他好像对妇女有点偏见。

sentences.sentence: University funding was tremendously biased toward scientists.
sentences.translation: 大学资助金是极度偏重于科学家的。

sentences.sentence: You can't help being biased so you may as well be up front about it.
sentences.translation: 你阻止不了别人对你的偏见，因此你还不如就大大方方地接受。
